channel.title: TwoHanded?
channel.description:
Hello, I'm using the PwnScape Source, which is also Delta scape source... But I have a problem I can figure out how to make my Dragon Claws to handed... Need Help please!
I went into item.java but there's only this:
[code]public static boolean[] itemTwoHanded = new boolean[19999];[/code]

item.title: TwoHanded?
item.dc:creator: @kyle123321 kyle123321
item.description:
@kyle123321 wrote:

kk I have dragon claws added, I can wear them but I can wear a shield at the same time… Which I don’t want.

Read full topic

item.title: TwoHanded?
item.dc:creator: @laveerre laveerre
item.description:
@laveerre wrote:

are you using a 317 source or another cuz if you’re useing 317 how can i add models like d claws??

Read full topic

item.title: TwoHanded?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

In Item.java you will see:

FileInputStream dataIn = new FileInputStream(new File("data/twohanded.dat")); while ((c = dataIn.read()) != -1) { if (c == 0) itemTwoHanded[counter] = false; else itemTwoHanded[counter] = true; counter++; }

Below that, add this:

itemTwoHanded[itemID] = true;

Replace ‘itemID’ with the ID of the item you wish to be two handed.

Read full topic
